contents.description: A discord bot that can provide rich information from multiple sources.
contents.name: BotBoy
contents.page:
BotBoy

A discord bot that can provide rich information from multiple sources.

Get information from various sources such as Overwatch, CS:GO, Minecraft, Steam and much more!

You can also get extensive information about other users, roles and servers with the commands ^userinfo, ^roleinfo and ^serverinfo respectively!

You can view all commands here, and make sure to invite him to your server!
